entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -10.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 10:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -10.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -11.9°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
